Uses of Package
srl.corpus

Packages that use srl.corpus
srl.corpus

Classes in srl.corpus used by srl.corpus
Corpus
          This class wraps Lucene to provide all the tools useful for access to the corpus.
Corpus.Overlap
          Used to represent an overlap in tagging
Corpus.QueryHit
          Derive an object from this class to provide a callback on query success
Processor
          Wraps the language processor, for easy interaction.
Splitter
          This interface represents a sentence splitter and the functions it is supposed to provide
SrlDocument
          This object is used to represent a tokenized document or sentence.
SrlQuery
          This represents a query on the Corpus object.
SrlToken
          Identical to a Lucene token.
